title: Smart Data Models - EarthFaultCompensator
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A conducting equipment used to represent a connection to ground which is typically used to compensate earth faults..   An earth fault compensator device modeled with a single terminal implies a second terminal solidly connected to ground.  If two terminals are modeled, the ground is not assumed and normal connection rules apply.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be EarthFaultCompensator

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nominal resistance of device. Default: 0.0
